title: Bondi Vet: Coast To Coast to return on Friday with five new veterinarians from across the country
text:
Fans won't have to wait much longer to enjoy Channel Nine's revamped version of Bondi Vet.

After teasing the new season for months, the network have announced that Bondi Vet: Coast To Coast will finally hit screens this Friday at 7.30pm.

During the season premiere, viewers will meet the five veterinarians from across Australia, who will replace outgoing host Dr Chris Brown.

They include emergency specialist Dr Alex Hynes, wildlife expert Dr Peter Ricci, Bondi local Dr Kate Adams, recent graduate Dr Danni Dusek and private practice owner Dr Lewis Hunt.

It's back! Fans won't have to wait much longer to enjoy Channel Nine's revamped version of Bondi Vet. After teasing the new season for months, the network have announced that Bondi Vet: Coast To Coast will finally hit screens this Friday at 7.30pm

Mobile-vet sisters Dr Alison and Dr Audrey Shen will also appear on the program.

In episode one, Bondi Vet Hospital owner Dr Kate discovers that a Dachshund named Gary has a life-threatening condition.

Meanwhile, Dr Alex begins to feel the pressure as she delivers 12 puppies, while Dr Peter takes on the challenge of performing surgery on a lion.

Big cast: During the season premiere, viewers will meet the five veterinarians from across Australia, who will replace outgoing host Dr Chris Brown. They include emergency specialist Dr Alex Hynes, wildlife expert Dr Peter Ricci, Bondi local Dr Kate Adams, recent graduate Dr Danni Dusek and private practice owner Dr Lewis Hunt

'Share the excitement, drama and tears of joy as these dedicated vets save the lives of beloved pets and exotic animals every day,' an official press release reads.

'It’s an amazing new season of inspiring true stories, courageous battles and little miracles, set against Australia’s iconic cities and beautiful beaches.'

Dr Chris Brown announced he was leaving Bondi Vet back in March 2017.

Competitive! The show's producers at WTFN Entertainment received thousands of applications after announcing their search for new vets to replace Dr Chris Brown

The show's producers at WTFN Entertainment received thousands of applications after announcing their search for new vets to replace Dr Chris.

Stepping down as host due to his busy schedule, Chris will continue to be involved in I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! and The Living Room.

Bondi Vet: Coast To Coast begins Friday October 11 at 7.30pm on Nine.
description: Fans won't have to wait much longer to enjoy Channel Nine's revamped version of Bondi Vet.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
